channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Parking bays of 65 Cavendish road, 20th January
item.description:
For more than 2 months the parking bays have been surrounded by the metal barriers with no any signs on or any indication of parking restrictions. Today 3 bays are occupied by the cars and the rest 2 bays are still surrounded by the barriers that go outside the bay markings and causing danger. Today the suspensions signs appeared but with effect from 27 Jan! And the barriers are still there!!!!

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several Potholes developing, 20th January
item.description:
There are 4 Potholes developing along the stretch of road between 1 to 7 Sayes Court Road

item.title: Dog mess again on pavement please kindly clear thanks, 20th January

item.title: Square area of previously patched pavement broken away, 20th January
item.description:
The surface has been breaking away for a while. But has now gone completely. It is approx 30cm square and 4-5cm deep. On a pavement close to Longlands Primary School. On many small children’s school run. It is outside 69 Longlands Road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 65, Longlands Road, Longlands, Sidcup, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Massive pot hole on drain, 20th January
item.description:
There is a pothole forming round the drain it’s been near a month and nothing has been done. Myself and others that work down this road have to drive 2mph over it so we don’t pop our tyres I feel this is getting very dangerous and will cause damage soon.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 27, High Street, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep pothole, 20th January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Prince of Wales Road, Blackheath, Greater London

item.title: Motorhome abandoned on road, 20th January
item.description:
Motorhome has been parked in the same position for at least 4 months and has not been moved. Horn Park lane is a very busy road and the Motorhome is obstructing visibility for home owners leaving their drive way. It’s is also a wide vehicle on a narrow, heavily congested street.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Horn Park Lane, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Extremely poor road surface, 20th January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 51, Harland Avenue, Longlands, Sidcup, Greater London

item.title: Birkbeck Hill SE21 outside number 7 or so, 20th January
item.description:
Birkbeck Hill SE21 outside number 7 or so is a road hole. Additionally the immediate tarmac around hole is in poor shape – on a steep slope so wears out quicker than a ‘flat’ road surface. Picture attached.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Birkbeck Hill, Tulse Hill, Greater London

item.title: Massive “sausage” next to lamp post, 20th January

item.title: Tree debris, 20th January
item.description:
I reported this few days ago and received email saying it had been cleared. IT HAS NOT. Leaves, twigs and branches from the tree outside 66 Aspen Green DA18 4HX, the road and pavement, has not been cleared away.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Aspen Green, Lower Belvedere, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
